contentList.content: Class Progression - Arcanist

Caster Overview: This class is considered to be a Limited Caster. They are capable of learning any Cantrip or Spell, however they must equip Spells within their Spellbook rather than having access to all Spells at all times. Additional Cantrips are gained at levels 5 and 9 for all classes capable of casting Spells. Limited Casters are capable of upcasting Spells to the sixth level.

Level 1: Gain Firepower and The Right Tools for the Job

Level 2: Select Two Class Passives

Level 3: Gain Mystic Reload

Level 4: Select a Feat

Level 5: Gain Extra Attack and Arcane Ballistics

Level 6: Select Two Class Passives

Level 7: Gain Ballistic Ricochet

Level 8: Select a Feat

Level 9: Gain Extra Attack: Martial Surge and Runic Reload Module

Level 10: Select Two Class Passives

Level 11: Gain Arcane Aim

Level 12: Select a Feat

Class Progression - College of Captivation

Caster Overview: This class is considered to be a Versatile Caster. They are capable of learning any Cantrip or Spell, however they may only learn one Spell per level, rather than two. Additional Cantrips are gained at levels 5 and 9 for all classes capable of casting Spells. Versatile Casters are capable of upcasting Spells to the sixth level.
